1: Your main program to run your AI system. Has functions such as memory, UI, ect.
Your program for your avatar. Runs your emotes, and your animations. You look great!
Runs your voicebox, converting the text you make to audio!
The voice translation program you are equipped with. It's pretty accurate! Translates our human voice to text for you to understand. Has a tendency to repeat things over and over at the end.
The loader for your language model. Has a variety of settings, such as temperature, which determines randomness.
